items.title: Spotify partners with Netflix to distribute a selection of video podcasts from Spotify Studios and The Ringer on Netflix starting in early 2026 in the US (Sarah Perez/TechCrunch)

Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
Spotify partners with Netflix to distribute a selection of video podcasts from Spotify Studios and The Ringer on Netflix starting in early 2026 in the US  —  Spotify is bringing its video podcasts to Netflix starting next year, the company announced on Tuesday.

items.title: US strike on boat off Venezuela kills six, Trump says
items.summary: WASHINGTON (Reuters) -A U.S. strike on a boat off the coast of Venezuela on Tuesday killed six suspected drug traffickers, President Donald Trump said in a social media post. Read full story

items.title: Spotify partners with Netflix for video podcast distribution deal
items.summary: Spotify is partnering with Netflix to bring select video podcasts to the streaming platform starting in early 2026. The deal will feature curated shows from Spotify Studios and The Ringer, expanding later to include more genres. The move reflects Spotify’s growing focus on video as a key driver for engagement and ad revenue, with video podcast consumption now growing 20 times faster than audio-only content.

items.title: This 10K power bank with lanyard USB-C cable is almost as compact as AirPods Pro, now down to $18 (Save 45%)
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, you’ll find INIU’s official storefront offering its compact 10,000mAh power bank with a lanyard USB-C cable for $18.10 Prime shipped, with a $15 coupon that auto-applies during checkout. Folks without a Prime membership can checkout with items worth over $35 in the cart. This is regularly a $33 unit, which is now seeing a $15 discount. It dropped to the $28 mark during the fall Prime Day sale earlier this month, but today’s deal shaves an additional $10 off that price to mark a new best price to beat. Head below for more details.

items.title: Document: to avoid an EU fine, Google offered to tweak its search results to show vertical search engines in their own box on Search (Foo Yun Chee/Reuters)

Foo Yun Chee / Reuters:
Document: to avoid an EU fine, Google offered to tweak its search results to show vertical search engines in their own box on Search  —  Alphabet's (GOOGL.O) Google has offered to make further changes to its search results in its latest attempt to avoid a European Union antitrust fine, according to a document seen by Reuters.

items.title: Mozilla’s Firefox adds Perplexity’s AI answer engine as a new search option
items.summary: The integration offers conversational, cited answers instead of traditional links and follows positive feedback from earlier tests in select markets. Perplexity will expand to mobile soon.

items.title: Over 5.7 mln people in Italy living in absolute poverty: ISTAT
items.summary: ROME, Oct. 14 (Xinhua) -- More than 5.7 million people in Italy were living in absolute poverty in 2024, with the overall rate remaining broadly unchanged from the previous year, the National Institute of Statistics (ISTAT) reported Tuesday. Read full story

items.title: Exclusive-Assad government secretly moved mass grave to cover up killings, Reuters investigation finds
items.summary: DHUMAIR, Syria -The Assad government carried out a two-year clandestine operation to truck thousands of bodies from one of Syria's largest known mass graves to a secret location more than an hour away in the remote desert, a Reuters investigation has found. Read full story

An ebook reader offers a more book-like reading experience, with fewer distractions and less eye strain, and many include extra features, like adjustable frontlighting. Some really are pocketable. items.title: Egypt shuts down Grand Egyptian Museum in preparation for official opening
items.summary: CAIRO, Oct. 14 (Xinhua) -- Egypt's Grand Egyptian Museum (GEM) is temporarily closed to the public from Oct. 15 to Nov. 3 in preparation for its official opening, scheduled for early November, according to an announcement published Monday on the museum's official website. Read full story

items.title: Hepatitis A outbreak in Czech Republic claims 10 lives in Prague
items.summary: PRAGUE, Oct. 14 (Xinhua) -- A growing outbreak of hepatitis A is spreading across the Czech Republic, with Prague reporting 826 cases since January and 10 deaths, the Prague public health authority HygPraha said on Tuesday. Read full story

items.title: Chinese standards strengthen schistosomiasis elimination efforts in Tanzania's Zanzibar
items.summary: DAR ES SALAAM, Oct. 14 (Xinhua) -- Chinese health experts are helping Tanzania's Zanzibar to eliminate schistosomiasis through the promotion of Chinese prevention and control standards and advanced diagnostic techniques. Read full story

items.title: Finnish economy back on recovery path: financial group
items.summary: HELSINKI, Oct. 14 (Xinhua) -- The Finnish economy is showing signs of renewed recovery after slowing earlier this year, with gross domestic product (GDP) expected to grow by 2 percent in 2026, according to OP Financial Group's latest forecast released on Tuesday. Read full story

items.summary:
Ashley Capoot / CNBC:
OpenAI forms the Expert Council on Well-Being and AI, with eight experts to help guide OpenAI's work on ChatGPT and Sora  —  OpenAI on Tuesday announced a council of eight experts who will advise the company and provide insight into how artificial intelligence could affect users' mental health, emotions and motivation.

items.title: Heybike offers Hero carbon-fiber all-terrain e-bikes at best prices starting from new $1,899 low (Reg. $2,599+), more
items.summary:
Heybike has launched its Halloween Sale with up to $800 savings on e-bikes and some FREE gear accompanying models, which coincides with the launch of its newest Helio F Smart Classic e-bike, which you can learn about in our initial coverage from Electrek. Among the bunch, the largest discount is hitting Heybike’s Hero Carbon-Fiber All-Terrain e-bikes, which are seeing a new low on the 1,000W rear hub model at $1,899 shipped, while the upgraded 750W mid-drive model is keeping to its $2,299 shipped rate we saw during Prime Day. These two e-bikes usually fetch $2,599 and $3,099 at full price, with the latter having sat at this all-time low for the first time during the brand’s Prime Day Sale, while the former is dropping under its previous $2,099 low from that sale for an even better-than-ever deal. Head below to check out the full lineup of savings we’re seeing this spooky season.

items.title: Google updates Search and Discover with collapsible ads, AI features, and more
items.summary: Google is rolling out updates to Search and Discover that introduce AI-powered features, improved navigation, and a new option to collapse ads. While users can now hide sponsored results, the “Sponsored” label will remain visible as they scroll — making ads persistent even when collapsed. Additional changes include new sports updates in Search and AI-driven topic previews in the Discover feed, launching first in the U.S., South Korea, and India.

Now, EcoFlow is bringing that low price back for the remaining days of its extended promotions, giving you a second-ever opportunity at $250 off its going rate ($450 off the MSRP) for the lowest price we have tracked. As part of its Deals of the Day offers, Best Buy currently has Lenovo’s 2025 Yoga Book 9i 2-in-1 OLED laptop down at $1,899.99 shipped. This is the latest model of the brand’s popular dual-screen laptop, which typically goes for $2,200. Today’s deal at Best Buy, however, shaves $300 off its usual going rate to mark the lowest price we have tracked for it to date. Lenovo, in case you’re wondering, currently has the same model with 32GB RAM and 1TB SSD listed at $1,911.99 shipped. Notably, Best Buy also has the previous-gen model with Intel’s Core Ultra 7 155U processor down at $1,499.99 shipped. This is easily one of the most unique laptops out there, and you can learn more about it in detail below.
